name: authorea
quote:
Authorea is used by over 65,000 researchers. Write, cite, collaborate,
    host data, and publish all in one place
description: I work across the stack developing new features for a real-time collaborative online document editor.

name: oak
quote: Oak is an independent design-led product studio based in sunny Brooklyn, New York. We make creative products like Dropmark and Sitelaf, and work on a number of other ventures.
description: I built client websites from scratch using Oak's in-house CMS Siteleaf. Also added additonal features to WorkingNotWorkng, a Webby-award-winning freelancing site.
